dcterms:description: The Human Connectome Project (HCP) provides a comprehensive dataset of brain imaging data, including T1w and T2w images, aimed at understanding the human brain's connectivity.
dcterms:title: Human Connectome Project (HCP)

dcterms:description: The Autism Brain Imaging Data Exchange (ABIDE) is a large-scale dataset aimed at evaluating the intrinsic brain architecture in autism, consisting of T1w images from various imaging sites.
dcterms:title: Autism Brain Imaging Data Exchange (ABIDE)

dcterms:description: The National Cancer Institute (NCI) dataset is used for automated segmentation of prostate structures, providing expert annotations for prostate MRI.

dcterms:description: PROMISE12 is a challenge dataset for evaluating prostate segmentation algorithms in MRI, providing expert annotations for prostate gland segmentation.

dcterms:description: The University Hospital of Zurich (USZ) dataset provides expert annotations for prostate MRI, focusing on the variability of manual segmentation.

dcterms:description: The Automated Cardiac Diagnosis Challenge (ACDC) dataset is used for cardiac MRI segmentation, providing annotations for various cardiac structures.

dcterms:description: The Right Ventricle Segmentation Challenge (RVSC) dataset focuses on the segmentation of the right ventricle from cardiac MRI, providing annotations for various cardiac structures.
